system.description: • Split: Some swarms split into two smaller swarms when @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wounded} (GM’s call). Reduce the @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03areaeffectat00]{Blast Template} one size after a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wound}; Small swarms are destroyed.
